response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our unique and valuable product to you. After careful consideration, I believe we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us. I am offering the product to you for $1,350,000. This price reflects its exceptional quality and the value it will bring to you, while also ensuring a fair return for our company. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this proposal.", "product_price": 1350000}
